scripts.docker-dev: docker exec -it prompt-journey-app npm run dev
scripts.docker-build: docker exec -it prompt-journey-app npm run build
scripts.docker-optimize_clear: docker exec -it prompt-journey-app php artisan optimize:clear
scripts.docker-cache_clear: docker exec -it prompt-journey-app php artisan cache:clear
scripts.docker-config_clear: docker exec -it prompt-journey-app php artisan config:clear
